body.p:
BANKING HOUSE OF JOSEPH A. PINER,
Newport, Ky., Dec 17 1860
Esq., Cash.
Dear Sir:
To his Excellency B Magoffin
Govenor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky
Dear sir

You will Confer a great favor on me by appointing William A. Piner Notaray Public, for Campbell County; he is my clerk; and as I have to protest a great deal of paper: these hard times; it would be a great advantage to have a Notara in my office

by so doing you will
much oblige

Campbell Co
Notary
Wm A Piner
Iss' Dec 19. 1860
